subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal has won 247 of 266 career matches on clay with his powerful legs and a forehand that produces dizzying spin, making him possibly the best clay-court player ever.
snippet: Rafael Nadal has won 247 of 266 career matches on clay with his powerful legs and a forehand that produces dizzying spin, making him possibly the best clay-court player ever.
